metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30849 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.8, watchOS 8,Safari 15, tvOS 15, iOS 15 and iPadOS 15, iTunes 12.12 for Windows.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30849` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.4-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
